Source.Name: gobject-introspection
Source.Summary: Generate interface introspection data for GObject libraries
Source.Description: GObject Introspection is a project for providing machine readable introspection data of the API of C libraries. This introspection data can be used in several different use cases, for example automatic code generation for bindings, API verification and documentation generation.

Package.Name: gobject-introspection
Package.Summary: Generate interface introspection data for GObject libraries
Package.Description: GObject Introspection is a project for providing machine readable introspection data of the API of C libraries. This introspection data can be used in several different use cases, for example automatic code generation for bindings, API verification and documentation generation.
